All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Actions
Provides action methods that can be called from YAML configuration files.
AppConfig
Application configuration class that's loaded from and saved to YAML files.
AppConfig.GameState
 
AppConfig.Window
Window configuration settings.
Audio
Utility class for playing audio files.
AudioListener
Monitors audio line events to detect when playback has completed.
BaseElement<D>
Abstract base class for all game elements.
BaseEvent
Abstract base class for all input event handlers.
BaseScene
Abstract base class for all game scenes.
Box<D>
Represents a box in n-dimensional space with two corner points.
Button<D>
Represents a clickable button in the UI.
Camera<D>
Represents a camera in the game world that follows a player.
CellTypes
 
Click
Handles mouse button click events.
Clock
Game clock that ensures consistent timing for game updates.
Closeable
Test implementation of AutoCloseable interface.
Color
Represents RGBA colors for rendering in the game engine.
Config
Configuration manager that loads app settings from YAML files.
Const
Utility class containing application-wide constants.
Controls
Manages input controls and event handlers.
ControlTypes
Enumeration of available input control types.
Dialog
Dialog/popup scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
Dim
Base interface for dimensional spaces in the game engine.
Dim1d
Implementation for one-dimensional space in the game engine.
Dim2d
Implementation for two-dimensional space in the game engine.
Dim3d
Implementation for three-dimensional space in the game engine.
Dim4d
Implementation for four-dimensional space in the game engine.
ElementFactory<D>
Factory for creating game elements based on dimension and type.
ElementTypes
Enumeration of available element types that can be created in the game.
Exceptions
Custom exception classes for the game application.
Exceptions.ConfigException
Exception thrown when there is an error related to configuration.
Exceptions.GameException
Exception thrown when there is a general game-loop-related error.
Exceptions.SceneException
Exception thrown when there is an error related to scenes.
Game1d
1D game scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
Game2d
2D game scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
Game3d
3D game scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
Game4d
4D game scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
GameLoop
Core game engine class that implements the main game loop.
GameState
Manages the current state of the game.
Gif<D>
Represents an Gif image element in the UI.
Goal<D>
Goal element
Ground<D>
Player element
Image<D>
Represents an image element in the UI.
KeyPress
Handles keyboard key press events.
Label<D>
Represents a text label element in the UI.
LOG
Utility class for application logging with multiple severity levels.
LOG.LogLevel
Log severity levels supported by the logging system.
Main
Main entry point for the game application.
Maze
Maze generation and management class.
MazeCell
Represents a cell in a maze.
Menu
Menu scene implementation that loads from YAML files.
MouseMove
Handles mouse movement events.
MoveEnum
 
Playback
Controls the playback of an audio file.
Player<D>
Represents a player character in the game world.
Player<D>
Player element
Pos<D>
Represents a position in n-dimensional space.
RenderWindow
The RenderWindow class handles the rendering operations for the game window.
SceneFactory
Factory for creating game scenes.
SceneTypes
Enumeration of available scene types in the game.
Scroll
Handles mouse scroll wheel events.
Selector
Represents a selector for UI elements and their associated event types.
Sprite
Represents a 2D texture loaded from an image file for rendering with OpenGL.
SpriteManager
Manages the loading and retrieval of sprites.
TestingThings
 
TextUtils
 
Utils
Utility class providing common functionality used throughout the application.
Vector<D>
A generic vector class that can handle different dimensions.
Wall<D>
Player element
Window
Manages the application window using GLFW.
YAMLPrint
Base class for objects that need a standardized string representation.
